channel.title: What do you tell the
channel.description: police when they ask your name? me and allmost everyone in my year say Peter Micmillan

item.title: What do you tell the
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:6, topic:63928”][quote author=error.login link=topic=92591.msg965754#msg965754 date=1172978650]

me and my friends were caught street fighting and because of taking a piss in front of a house.
I told my real name but immediatly after that i regret it.i should’ve told them another name

lol an remove that swear word! my swear box is getting to big
[/quote]
fuck shit bollocks titties penis vagina cunt dickhead nob asshole.

Whats with this swear box business? :p[/quote]
i dunno i just was bored so i made it up

item.title: What do you tell the
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Well, i would tell the police my real name.
But for a fake name i always use the name tony fisher (no idea why).

A year or two ago when i was in trouble with the police they asked my phone number, i gave them the correct one and they rang it and no one answered so they started shouting at me saying i was lying lol. turned out my mum was at my nans house lol.
Btw i was in trouble because i sat on a bollard (google image search if you dont know what they are).

Read full topic
